Detailed Description

Basic frame manipulation.

Basic frame manipulation.

Function Documentation

void cvl_get ( cvl_frame_t *  frame,
int  channel,
int  x,
int  y,
float *  result 
)

Parameters:
frame The frame.
channel The channel.
x The left x coordinate.
y The top y coordinate.
result A buffer for one or four floats.
Gets the value of the pixel at x, y from the frame frame and stores it in result. If channel is 0, 1, 2, or 3, then a single float from the corresponding channel in frame is stored in result. If channel is -1, then four floats, one for each channel, are stored in result.

void cvl_fill_rect ( cvl_frame_t *  frame,
int  x,
int  y,
int  w,
int  h,
const float *  val 
)

Parameters:
frame The frame.
x The left x coordinate.
y The top y coordinate.
w The width of the rectangle.
h The height of the rectangle.
val The values to fill the rectangle with.
Fills the rectangle given by x, y, w, h in the frame frame with the values val. val must contain 4 values, one for each channel.

void cvl_copy_rect ( cvl_frame_t *  dst,
int  dst_x,
int  dst_y,
cvl_frame_t *  src,
int  src_x,
int  src_y,
int  rwidth,
int  rheight 
)

Parameters:
dst The destination frame.
dst_x The x coordinate of the destination rectangle's upper left corner.
dst_y The y coordinate of the destination rectangle's upper left corner.
src The source frame.
src_x The x coordinate of the source rectangle's upper left corner.
src_y The y coordinate of the source rectangle's upper left corner.
rwidth The width of the rectangle.
rheight The height of the rectangle.
Copies the given rectangle from src to dst. Destination and source must not be the same frame. The frame formats should be the same in most cases.

void cvl_copy ( cvl_frame_t *  dst,
cvl_frame_t *  src 
)

Parameters:
dst The destination frame.
src The source frame.
Copies the contents of src to dst.

void cvl_cut_rect ( cvl_frame_t *  dst,
cvl_frame_t *  src,
int  x,
int  y 
)

Parameters:
dst The destination frame.
src The source frame.
x The x coordinate of the rectangle.
y The y coordinate of the rectangle.
Cuts a rectangle out of frame src and stores it in dst. The rectangle will have the size of dst.

void cvl_resize ( cvl_frame_t *  dst,
cvl_frame_t *  src,
int  x_offset,
int  y_offset,
const float *  val 
)

Parameters:
dst The destination frame.
src The source frame.
x_offset The x position of the original frame contents in the resized frame.
y_offset The y position of the original frame contents in the resized frame.
val The value that resulting holes will be filled with.
Returns:
The resized frame.
Resizes the frame src to dst. Position the contents of src at x_offset, y_offset. Resulting holes will be filled with val, which must contain 4 values, one for each channel.
